entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
